title: Sales Development Specialist
job_overview:
Are you confident on the phone, naturally organized, and energized by conversations that lead to real opportunities?
If you're nodding, you might be exactly who we're looking for.

We’re hiring a Sales Development Specialist to help a fast-growing energy brokerage firm connect with more businesses looking for cost-effective commercial electricity contracts. Your role? Own the early stages of the sales process—outbound calling, lead qualification, appointment setting—so the principal broker can focus on closing deals.

If you're someone who enjoys making meaningful connections, staying sharp with details, and knows how to keep conversations moving, this is your chance to make a measurable impact.

What You’ll Be Doing:
Making outbound calls to warm/cold leads using vetted lists and databases.
Starting genuine conversations that qualify prospects and build rapport.
Setting appointments and making smooth handoffs to the principal broker.
Keeping records clean and organized in CRMs like Zoho, HubSpot, or Propstream.
Following up with leads via phone and email to keep Upgrade to see actual infontum strong.
Re-engaging old/dormant leads and assisting with list management.
Occasionally helping with light admin tasks tied to sales development.

You’ll Thrive in This Role If You:
Are a confident communicator who knows how to build trust quickly over the phone.
Have experience in outbound sales, appointment setting, or SDR roles.
Know your way around CRM tools and can keep lead data tidy and actionable.
Are comfortable with cold/warm calling and handling basic objections.
Stay organized and proactive, managing follow-ups and keeping pipelines moving.
Take pride in being reliable, professional, and a strong first impression for the company.
Are tech-comfortable—you’re fine navigating calling tools, emails, and CRMs.

What We’re Looking For:
At least 2 years of experience in sales development or outbound calling roles.
Strong English communication skills, both spoken and written.
Confident in phone outreach, with consistent follow-through.
Familiar with CRMs like Zoho, HubSpot, Propstream, or similar tools.
A team player who’s coachable, self-motivated, and ready to contribute.

Company Benefits:
$500 USD Sign-In Bonus if you apply between July 10 to September 25, 2025
Competitive compensation package
Opportunity to work closely with high-level executives from various industries.
Professional growth and development.
Chance to contribute to the success and growth of our clients.
Supportive and collaborative team environment.
Paid US Federal Holidays
Paid Time Off
Healthcare Package
1 Year Travel Bonus
Year-End Bonus

How to Apply:
1. Complete the Form: Start by filling out the form at Upgrade to see actual info.
2. Video Recording: Ensure you have a professional background when recording your video.
3. Be Authentic: We strongly discourage reading from a script. Instead, be genuine and let your personality shine!
4. Email Confirmation: Make sure to provide a valid email address to receive our application confirmation. If you don’t see the confirmation email, double-check for any spelling errors and resubmit the form with the correct email.
5. Next Steps: If your qualifications meet our criteria, our Recruitment Specialist will reach out to you.
